# Unicode.GeneralCategory.currencySymbol

**Case**

A currency sign.

## Declaration

```swift
case currencySymbol
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Currency_Symbol` (abbreviated `Sc`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.currencySymbol
